docs.snippet: Facebook executives have been cautioning investors that the social-networking giant’s growth might start to slow. The latest earnings report suggests that hasn’t happened yet.

headline.print_headline: Facebook’s Profit Surges, Despite Predictions of a Slowdown
headline.main: Facebook’s Profit and Revenue Surge, Despite Company Predictions of a Slowdown
